alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 16 at 10:31PM AKST until December 19 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures will be in place throughout this event. Lowest wind chills of 15 -degrees below zero are possible late Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
